name: HEC UES2 Wired Optical Mouse
Features: [Black and Silver color scheme, 5-level Retractable cable (from 2" to 28"), Small and compact design (3 1/8'' L x 1 1/2'' W x 6/8'' H, 1.3 oz), Accurate tracking on almost any surface, 3-button Scroll Wheel Mouse, USB powered. No battery necessary, Easy to Install (Just insert the USB receiver and ready to go), Optical Orientation Technology High accuracy and reliability (800DPI)]
